DOC.criteria: Patients provide write informed consent Patients cover Health Insurance scheme Age > 18 year Normal pregnancy preeclampsia define accord follow classical criterion : ( ) de novo hypertension define arterial blood pressure least 140 mm Hg ( systolic ) least 90 mm Hg ( diastolic ) confirm least two measurement separate least 46 h , occur 20th week gestation woman know beforehand normal blood pressure , ( ii ) proteinuria define urinary excretion least 300 mg protein per 24 h. If 24hour urine available , proteinuria define concentration urinary protein 300 mg/L ( > 1 + urinary dip ) least two sample urine take randomly , interval least 46 h [ 7 ] . Preeclampsia define severe : persistent systolic BP > 170 mm Hg and/or diastolic BP > 110 mm Hg , and/or diuresis < 30 ml/hour , and/or least 2 follow sign ( headache , phosphenes , epigastric pain vomiting , pyramidaltype patellar reflex , papilledema , hepatic pain , thrombopenia < 100x106 /l , ALT AST > 70 UI/l hemolysis manifest haptoglobin < 0.06 g/l , fall LDH presence schistocytes , latter three sign define HELLP syndrome ) and/or seizure . Term > 26 SA . Refusal provide consent Context patent infection . Premature rupture fetal membrane . preexist gestational diabetes . Vasculoplacental disease preeclampsia : placental abruption infarction , intrauterine growth retardation utero fetal death occur context preeclampsia .
